Web Development Studio

who dis?_

We are </no tags> , a web development studio based in Moscow (Russia), and we are fluent in several languages:

  • JavaScript
  • Ruby
  • HTML5
  • CSS3
  • Sass

All of our code is handcrafted following TDD and BDD best practices. Some of the technologies used at the studio:

  • Ruby on Rails
  • Node.js
  • React.js
  • Meteor.js

When delivering a Web Application, maximize cross-browser compatibility is one of our main goals:

  • Google Chrome
  • Mozilla Firefox
  • Safari
  • Internet Explorer
